sentences.en: 'Some of the new developments are most ingenious.
sentences.cn: “ 有些新发展是极其聪明的.

sentences.en: By dint of this ingenious scheme, his gloves were got on.
sentences.cn: 靠这种巧妙的方法, 他那副手套终于戴上了.

sentences.en: Gautier's solution to the puzzle is ingenious.
sentences.cn: 戈蒂埃破解这道难题的方法很巧妙。

sentences.en: He had some ingenious men among his friends.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友中,有一些思想敏慧的人.

sentences.en: He had some letters, and was ingenious, but he was an infidel.
sentences.cn: 他有一些学问, 且很有见地, 对宗教却不屑一顾.

sentences.en: His preaching was ingenious and pithy.
sentences.cn: 他的传教是发人深省的,精辟有力的.

sentences.en: His solution to the puzzle is ingenious.
sentences.cn: 他破解这道难题的方法很巧妙。

sentences.en: It was the offspring of a most ingenious brain.
sentences.cn: 这真是聪明绝顶的头脑想出来的绝招儿.

sentences.en: Many fish have ingenious ways of protecting their eggs from predators.
sentences.cn: 很多鱼都有绝妙的方法来保护它们产的卵不被捕食者吃掉。

sentences.en: Scientists might be amazed by the ingenious arrangement of the apparatus.
sentences.cn: 这种装置精巧的构造可能使科学家感到惊奇.

sentences.en: The director used ingenious devices to keep the audience in suspense.
sentences.cn: 导演用巧妙手法引起观众的悬念.

sentences.en: The ingenious boy made a radio set for himself.
sentences.cn: 这个聪明的男孩自己做了一台收音机.

sentences.en: They are obliged to resort to the most ingenious contortions and combinations.
sentences.cn: 他们却不能不采取最巧妙的曲解和胡说.

sentences.en: Try to think of unusual and ingenious solutions.
sentences.cn: 尽量想想不同寻常的、巧妙的解决方法.

words.tran_cn: 机敏（精巧；精致；有创造才能）
心灵手巧，独创性；精巧；精巧的装置

trans.tran_cn: 灵巧的，精巧的，设计独特的，有天才的，聪明的
trans.tran_en: (of an object, a plan, an idea, etc.) very suitable for a particular purpose and resulting from clever new ideas
